    • getInputNonBlocking

      public String getInputNonBlocking()
      Gets user input from the stream in the reader, via a thread dedicated to reading user input. When this method is called, every input is reset.
      Returns:
      the string input by the user

    • getInputNonBlocking

      private String getInputNonBlocking(InterfaceInterrupt interruptingCondition)
      Gets user input from the stream in the reader, via a thread dedicated to reading user input. When this method is called, every input is reset. This method returns with the empty string in case the interruptingConditions is triggered
      Parameters:
      interruptingCondition - the condition that makes the method return prematurely
      Returns:
      the string input by the user, or the empty string if the interruptingCondition was triggered

    • getInputNonBlocking

      private String getInputNonBlocking(List<InterfaceInterrupt> interruptingConditions)
      Gets user input from the stream in the reader, via a thread dedicated to reading user input. When this method is called, every input is reset. This method returns with the empty string in case one of the interruptingConditions is triggered
      Parameters:
      interruptingConditions - the conditions that make the method return prematurely
      Returns:
      the string input by the user, or the empty string if one of the interruptingConditions was triggered

    • checkInterrupt

      private boolean checkInterrupt(List<InterfaceInterrupt> interruptingConditions)
      If the condition is triggered when true(false) and the interrupt IS true(false) for any interrupt in the list return true
      Parameters:
      interruptingConditions - the conditions to check
      Returns:
      true if at least one condition is triggered

    • getInputNonBlockingLegacy

      @Deprecated public String getInputNonBlockingLegacy(List<InterfaceInterrupt> interruptingConditions)
      Deprecated.
      Gets user input from the stream in the reader, exiting and returning the empty string in case one of the interruptingConditions is true
      Parameters:
      interruptingConditions - the conditions that make the method return, in case the input wasn't read already
      Returns:
      the string input by the user, or the empty string if one of the interruptingConditions was triggered

    • isCorrectInput

      private boolean isCorrectInput(String input)
      Check all available commands with the respective parameters required and compare them to the input string The command must be in the same form as the enum (may be changed) and the parameters must be in the same number as those required
      Parameters:
      input - the string input by the user containing the command (and its parameters)
      Returns:
      true if the input matches with one of the commands' names and parameters

    • isInputCompatible

      private boolean isInputCompatible(String inputString, NetworkFieldEnum networkFieldEnum)
      Tests whether the input string is compatible with the given network field's class
      Parameters:
      inputString - the string containing the input field
      networkFieldEnum - the network field that the string needs to be compared to
      Returns:
      true if inputString can be converted to the type of the network field

    • resetInterrupts

      private void resetInterrupts(List<InterfaceInterrupt> interrupts)
      Resets the interrupts in the given list
      Parameters:
      interrupts - the list of interrupts to reset
